title: Jaguar Land Rover's FY24 sales jumps 81%, a five-year high and "one of the best since 2009"
description: Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) reported a significant 81% increase in retail sales in India for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2024. This growth represents one of the company's best performances since its launch in 2009 and is the highest in the last five years. Sales of SUVs, Range Rover, and Defender notably increased by 160% and 120% respectively year-on-year.
